data.title: Dina Merrill Net Worth in 2024
data.meta_description: Dina Merrill Net Worth by ALUX.COM. How much money does Dina Merrill have? How rich is Dina Merrill? How much is Dina Merrill Worth? Answers here!
data.text:
Dina Merrill Net Worth: How rich is Dina Merrill? & How much money is Dina Merrill worth? Time to find out!

Dina Merrill is an American actress, socialite, businesswoman and philanthropist. and her current net worth is $5.5 billion.

The actress was born in New York City as the only child of Post Cereals heiress Marjorie Merriweather Post and Edward Francis Hutton, a Wall Street stockbroker.

Growing up, she attended George Washington University in Washington, D.C. for one semester before dropping out and enrolling at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts in New York City.

She started her acting career on advice from her half-sister’s husband and took the stage name Dina Merrill, borrowing from Charles E. Merrill.

The actress made her stage debut in the play The Mermaid Singing in 1945, and in 2005 she received a lifetime achievement award from the American Academy of Dramatic Arts.

The actress, who is now retired, had roles in films like Desk Set (1957), Operation Petticoat (1959), Butterfield 8 (1960), A Wedding (1978), True Colors (1991), that’s just to name a few.

Apart from the big-screen films, she has also appeared in made-for-TV movies, such as Seven in Darkness (1969), Family Flight (1972), and The Tenth Month (1979).

She has also appeared as a guest star on several television series such as in two episodes of Batman as the famous villain, Calamity Jan.

Her stage credits include the 1983 Broadway revival of the Rodgers & Hart musical On Your Toes, starring Russian prima ballerina Natalia Makarova.

She is still a presidential appointee to the Broad of Trustees of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, a vice president of the New York City Mission Society.

Since 1980 she has been on the board of directors of her father’s E. F. Hutton & Co., continuing on the board of directors and the compensation committee of Lehman Brothers when it acquired Hutton, for over 18 years.

She has been married three times; with two of her previous husbands she had four kids. Currently she is married with former actor Ted Hartley since 1989.

This wraps up our Dina Merrill Net Worth profile!
